com.lukeleber.scandroid.gui.fragments.util

Class ParameterModel<T extends java.io.Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukeleber.scandroid.gui.fragments.util.ParameterModel<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable, java.io.Serializable

    public final class ParameterModel<T extends java.io.Serializable>
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.os.Parcelable, java.io.Serializable
    A class that acts to bind a PID to an unspecified point in time. Generally used in view adapters, this model yields the following information:
    • All information provided through the PID interface
    • The last known value of the PID as reported by the vehicle
    • The unit of the last known value
    • The time (unix timestamp) that this model was last updated
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
